{{Description|This seemingly ordinary strike contains Heizou's desire for criminals to honestly confess and repent.}}
'''Heartstopper Strike''' is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When this skill hits at least one [[enemy]], it generates different amounts of [[Elemental Particles]] depending on the amount of Declension stacks.
** At 0-1 stacks, it generates '''2''' particles.
** At 2-3 stacks, it generates '''2.5''' particles.
** At 4 stacks, it generates '''3''' particles.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Skill DMG|0}}
* Declension stacks will remain when Heizou switches out.
* The number of Declension stacks Shikanoin Heizou possesses is indicated by the circle <!--someone please come up with a better word-->next to him.
* {{TalentNote|ascension|1|Paradoxical Practice|character=Shikanoin Heizou|talent=Heartstopper Strike}}
* {{TalentNote|ascension|2|Penetrative Reasoning|character=Shikanoin Heizou|talent=Heartstopper Strike}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Named Juvenile Casebook}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Esoteric Puzzle Book}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Curious Casefiles}}
